DataElement.preferredName: Patient Without Biological Agent Or Retinoid Administered Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a yes/no indicator related to a person who receives medical attention in the absence of biotechnology-derived pharmaceutical agents or a class of chemical compounds that are related chemically to vitamin A.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Without Biological Agent Or Retinoid Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a person who receives medical attention in the absence of biotechnology-derived pharmaceutical agents or a class of chemical compounds that are related chemically to vitamin A.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Without Biological Agent Or Retinoid Administered
Property.preferredDefinition: Used to indicate the absence or lack of something or someone. (from Merriam-Webster OnLine):Biotechnology-derived pharmaceutical agents made from living organisms or their products.  Includes recombinant proteins, monoclonal antibodies, and nucleic acids.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Class of compounds consisting of four isoprenoid units joined in a head-to-tail manner and customarily containing five conjugated double bonds.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: Used to indicate the absence or lack of something or someone.
Biotechnology-derived pharmaceutical agents made from living organisms or their products. Includes recombinant proteins, monoclonal antibodies, and nucleic acids.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Class of compounds consisting of four isoprenoid units joined in a head-to-tail manner and customarily containing five conjugated double bonds.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to COG for by script Thu Jan 2 10:00:57 EST 2014

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient been without trea
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient been without treatment with a non-myelosuppressive biologic agent or retinoid >= 7 days of study entry?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have at least 7 days elapsed since the completion of therapy?
